text: "Something in Your Eyes" is a song co-produced and performed by American contemporary R&B; group Bell Biv DeVoe, issued as the second single from the group's second studio album Hootie Mack. It was the only song from the album to chart on the Billboard Hot 100, peaking at #38 in 1993. ==Music video== The official music video for the song was directed by Lionel C.
